text:
In my index.html files, the SSIs get passed through to the client as text if my
URL leaves off "index.html".

e.g. For URL http://computer '<!--#include virtual="/header.html"-->' shows up
in the source code that the browser receives.

     However, URL http://computer/index.html works just fine and the SSI gets
interpreted.
creator: ryep@brocade.com
slive@apache.org
text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 7699 ***
